scripts.build: bunx tailwindcss -i ./src/styles/main.css -o ./public/styles.css --minify && echo "export const styles = \`$(cat public/styles.css | sed 's/\`/\\\`/g')\`;" > src/styles.ts && bunx tsc
scripts.build:css: bunx tailwindcss -i ./src/styles/main.css -o ./public/styles.css --minify && echo "export const styles = \`$(cat public/styles.css | sed 's/\`/\\\`/g')\`;" > src/styles.ts
